p: The best antimicrobial activity of hemp EO was against Staphylococcus aureus subsp. aureus and Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica, whole EO and EO fractions against two G +, two G âˆ’ and all Candida species, EO fraction from the nonground was found against Yersinia eneterocolitica and EO fraction from nonground materials against S. aureus subsp . aureus.
